entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:44 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 07:44 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
